017
018package org.tquadrat.foundation.xml.builder.internal;
019
020import static java.util.Collections.emptyList;
021import static java.util.Collections.emptyMap;
022import static java.util.Collections.emptySet;
023import static org.apiguardian.api.API.Status.INTERNAL;
024import static org.tquadrat.foundation.lang.CommonConstants.EMPTY_STRING;
025import static org.tquadrat.foundation.lang.Objects.requireNonNullArgument;
026import static org.tquadrat.foundation.lang.Objects.requireNotEmptyArgument;
027import static org.tquadrat.foundation.util.StringUtils.isNotEmpty;
028import static org.tquadrat.foundation.xml.builder.XMLBuilderUtils.getElementNameValidator;
029import static org.tquadrat.foundation.xml.builder.spi.SGMLPrinter.repeat;
030
031import java.net.URI;
032import java.util.Collection;
033import java.util.Map;
034import java.util.Optional;
035
036import org.apiguardian.api.API;
037import org.tquadrat.foundation.annotation.ClassVersion;
038import org.tquadrat.foundation.xml.builder.Namespace;
039import org.tquadrat.foundation.xml.builder.spi.Element;
040import org.tquadrat.foundation.xml.builder.spi.InvalidXMLNameException;
041
042/**
043 *  The definition for the XML DocType element.
044 *
045 *  @extauthor Thomas Thrien - thomas.thrien@tquadrat.org
046 *  @version $Id: DocType.java 980 2022-01-06 15:29:19Z tquadrat $
047 *  @since 0.0.5
048 *
049 *  @UMLGraph.link
050 */
051@ClassVersion( sourceVersion = "$Id: DocType.java 980 2022-01-06 15:29:19Z tquadrat $" )
052@API( status = INTERNAL, since = "0.0.5" )
053public class DocType implements Element
054{
055        /*------------*\
056    ====** Attributes **=======================================================
057        \*------------*/
058    /**
059     *  The name of the DTD; may be {@code null}.
060     */
061    private final String m_DTDName;
062
063    /**
064     *  The name of the element that defines the document type.
065     */
066    private final String m_ElementName;
067
068    /**
069     *  The parent for this {@code DOCTYPE}.
070     */
071    private Element m_Parent = null;
072
073    /**
074     *  The URI for the DTD.
075     */
076    private final URI m_URI;
077
078        /*--------------*\
079    ====** Constructors **=====================================================
080        \*--------------*/
081    /**
082     *  Creates a new {@code DocType} instance.<br>
083     *  <br>The given element name is validated using the method that is
084     *  provided by
085     *  {@link org.tquadrat.foundation.xml.builder.XMLBuilderUtils#getElementNameValidator()}.
086     *
087     *  @param  elementName The name of the element that defines the document
088     *      type.
089     *  @param  uri The URI for the DTD.
090     */
091    public DocType( final String elementName, final URI uri )
092    {
093        if( !getElementNameValidator().test( requireNotEmptyArgument( elementName, "elementName" ) ) )
094        {
095            throw new InvalidXMLNameException( elementName );
096        }
097        m_ElementName = elementName;
098        m_URI = requireNonNullArgument( uri, "uri" );
099        m_DTDName = null;
100    }   //  DocType()
101
102    /**
103     *  Creates a new {@code DocType} instance.
104     *
105     *  @param  elementName The name of the element that defines the document
106     *      type.
107     *  @param  dtdName    The name of the DTD.
108     *  @param  uri The URI for the DTD.
109     */
110    public DocType( final String elementName, final String dtdName, final URI uri )
111    {
112        if( !getElementNameValidator().test( requireNotEmptyArgument( elementName, "elementName" ) ) )
113        {
114            throw new InvalidXMLNameException( elementName );
115        }
116        m_ElementName = elementName;
117        m_URI = requireNonNullArgument( uri, "uri" );
118        m_DTDName = requireNotEmptyArgument( dtdName, "dtdName" );
119    }   //  DocType()
120
121        /*---------*\
122    ====** Methods **==========================================================
123        \*---------*/
124    /**
125     *  {@inheritDoc}
126     */
127    @Override
128    public final Optional<String> getAttribute( final String name ) { return Optional.empty(); }
129
130    /**
131     *  {@inheritDoc}
132     */
133    @Override
134    public final Map<String,String> getAttributes() { return emptyMap(); }
135
136    /**
137     *  {@inheritDoc}
138     */
139    @Override
140    public final Collection<? extends Element> getChildren() { return emptyList(); }
141
142    /**
143     *  {@inheritDoc}
144     */
145    @Override
146    public final String getElementName() { return "DOCTYPE"; }
147
148    /**
149     *  {@inheritDoc}
150     */
151    @Override
152    public final Collection<Namespace> getNamespaces() { return emptySet(); }
153
154    /**
155     *  {@inheritDoc}
156     */
157    @Override
158    public final Optional<Element> getParent() { return Optional.ofNullable( m_Parent ); }
159
160    /**
161     *  {@inheritDoc}
162     */
163    @Override
164    public final boolean hasChildren() { return false; }
165
166    /**
167     *  {@inheritDoc}
168     */
169    @Override
170    public final boolean isBlock() { return true; }
171
172    /**
173     *  Checks if the doc type is based on a public or a local (system) DTD.
174     *
175     *  @return {@code true} if the DTD is public, {@code false} if
176     *      it is a local DTD.
177     */
178    @SuppressWarnings( "PublicMethodNotExposedInInterface" )
179    public final boolean isPublic() { return isNotEmpty( m_DTDName ); }
180
181    /**
182     *  {@inheritDoc}
183     */
184    @Override
185    public final <E extends Element> void setParent( final E parent ) { m_Parent = requireNonNullArgument( parent, "parent" ); }
186
187    /**
188     *  {@inheritDoc}
189     *
190     *  @param  indentationLevel    Ignored, should be always 0.
191     *  @param  prettyPrint Ignored.
192     */
193    @Override
194    public final String toString( final int indentationLevel, final boolean prettyPrint )
195    {
196        //---* Calculate the indentation *-------------------------------------
197        final var filler = prettyPrint ? "\n" + repeat( indentationLevel ) : EMPTY_STRING;
198
199        final var retValue = new StringBuilder( filler ).append( "<!DOCTYPE " ).append( m_ElementName );
200        if( isPublic() )
201        {
202            retValue.append( " PUBLIC \"" ).append( m_DTDName ).append( "\" \"" ).append( m_URI.toString() );
203        }
204        else
205        {
206            retValue.append( " SYSTEM \"" ).append( m_URI.toString() );
207        }
208        retValue.append( "\"" ).append( ">" );
209
210        //---* Done *----------------------------------------------------------
211        return retValue.toString();
212    }   //  toString()
213
214    /**
215     *  {@inheritDoc}
216     */
217    @Override
218    public final String toString() { return toString( 0, true ); }
219}
220//  class DocType
221
222/*
223 *  End of File
224 */
